b'RT @BlueToothDDS: @LuisVSanchez777 @TidefallCapital @icebergdevalor 3) vLTO started offline (think big ticket mattress, appliance, tires, j\xe2\x80\xa6'

b'@LuisVSanchez777 @TidefallCapital @icebergdevalor 3) vLTO started offline (think big ticket mattress, appliance, tires, jewelry, electronics stores) and starting to make inroads into the online channels of those same retailers. See here for $PGR which is only starting to rollout at Best Buy and Lowes; less niche than BNPL https://t.co/hNaRLRsu1I'

b'@LuisVSanchez777 @TidefallCapital @icebergdevalor 2) Agree legacy branch based LTO secularly challenged. This is why both went big into virtual LTO: $RCII bought Preferred Lease/Acima and $AAN bought $PGR. AAN smart to spin off PGR, likely endgame for RCII as well. vLTO more comparable to BNPL but secured vs unsecured lending'
